_header: Miserere miseres welle ful of grace
Subjects: Virgin Mary, prayers to; prayers, to Virgin Mary; Virgin Mary, aid to salvation
_description: A prayer to the Virgin Mary asking for aid — two macaronic couplets

BodHolkM39.Transcription:
Miserere miseres welle ful of graceDa nobis cum liberis
                    in heuene seen þin faceHelp marie at domys day aue
                    dampnadorumTo wynnyn a sete þan for ay sedem
                    saluandorum
